sections.heading: lands; waste or trespass; violations; submission to grand jury
sections.text: A judge of the district court shall refer charges made under section 72-245 to the grand jury at each term for investigation, and it shall make presentment of all violations thereof.SourceLaws 1899, c. 69, ยง 24, p. 312;R.S.1913, ยง 5868;C
